definitions.title: vb. Pi
definitions.body: press, squeeze (NH [[עִשָּׂה]] Pi. compel; Targum [[עַסִּי]] Pa. crush, gnash (teeth); cf. Ar. ga4iya compress a woman);—Pf. 3 pl. [[עִשּׂוּ דַּדֵּי בְּתוּלִים]] Ez Eze 23:3, Eze 23:8 (unchaste act); Inf. cstr. [[דַּדַּיִךְ]]…[[בַּעֲשׂוֹת]] v:Eze 23:21 rd. Pi. [[בְּעַשּׂוֹת]] (Ew Co Toy, al.).
